blocks.heading: We’ve got your back.
blocks.content: You’ve invested a lot of money into your website, and now it’s our turn to help you keep it running smoothly.
Our professional and experienced Wordpress gurus are here to monitor and maintain your site so that you can stay ahead of any eventuality.
With regular backups, security, premium hosting, and round the clock 24/7 monitoring we make sure that your site has all of the tools needed to bring its A game.

blocks.heading: Imagine peace of mind.
blocks.content: 24/7/365 Monitoring, Robust Security, Blazing Speed, Nightly Backups, and much much more...

blocks.heading: What sets our care plans apart?
Full Service Support
blocks.content: Sometimes you need extra help. If you ever find yourself in need of support, we are just an email away. Our team is always happy to help resolve any issue you can think of.

blocks.heading: Robust Security
blocks.content: According to Security Magazine, websites experience a hacker attack every 39 seconds. We ensure your your site is secured with daily scans, malware monitoring and removal, password securing via Google Captcha, and Intelligent IP Blocking.

blocks.heading: Software Updates
blocks.content: One of the leading causes of Wordpress vulnerabilities or crashes are due to plugins not being updated regularly or properly. We handle your plugins,  Wordpress Core, and PHP updates to ensure that your site always puts it best foot forward.

blocks.heading: First Class Hosting
blocks.content: Your site deserves the best, so we start by hosting it on a premium website host. With 99% uptime and 24/7/365 monitoring to ensure your site doesn’t go down, we’ve got you covered.

blocks.heading: Incredible Performance
blocks.content: Whether your visitor is coming from New York or Osaka, our CDN will select the closest point of presence (POP) to serve your website from. This, combined with advanced website caching technology results in load times that positively impact your SEO and even your conversions.

blocks.heading: Nightly Backups
blocks.content: We understand how important your website is. So to protect one of your most valuable assets, we employ nightly backups to Google Cloud Platform servers. Our backups and monitoring work together to ensure that your site is prepared for any eventuality.

blocks.heading: What can I do with content edits?
blocks.content: Typically, content edits refer to any change that can be done in 30 minutes or less without editing your website code. If you have a more complex problem, we are happy to troubleshoot it and discuss what resolutions we can offer. Below are some examples of use cases that can be covered with your unlimited content edits.

blocks.heading: Text Changes
blocks.content: Add or Edit a blog post, page, WooCommerce product, etc.

blocks.heading: Software Changes
blocks.content: Edit your menus and widgets, Install or Activate plugins, etc.
